revised_title: Trinitro-Orcin: A New Nitro-Substitution Compound and Its Derivatives
tldr: The author describes the synthesis and properties of trinitro-orcin, a new nitro-substitution compound derived from orcein. Trinitro-orcin forms yellow crystalline needles and has various applications, including dyeing fabrics and forming salts with different metals. The author also discusses the preparation and properties of these metal salts.
